C

ClientHandler - Class in network
ClientHandler Class connect with some client and ment to deal with his problem and get the solution for him
Has Socket socket data member
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class network.ClientHandler
c'tor gets Socket socket and initialize the this.socket by the given one
CommonHeuristicSearcher - Class in model.algorithms
This abstract class defines common denominator to all searchers with heuristic contains Heuristic data member
CommonHeuristicSearcher() - Constructor for class model.algorithms.CommonHeuristicSearcher
 
CommonSearchDomain - Interface in model.domains
This interface defines common denominator to all domains that can be solved using search algorithm.
CommonSearcher - Class in model.algorithms
This abstract class defines common denominator to all searchers contains boolean data member - stop
CommonSearcher() - Constructor for class model.algorithms.CommonSearcher
 
compareTo(State) - Method in class model.algorithms.State
 
concatenateStringWithAlgorithm() - Method in class model.MyModel

config - package config
 
createAlgorithm(String) - Method in class model.SearchAlgorithmsFactory
gets String algorithm name and creates an instance of the suitable algorithm
this method return the instance of the algorithm which was created.
createDomain(String, String) - Method in class model.SearchDomainsFactory
gets String domain name and creates an instance of the suitable domain
this method return the instance of the domain which was created.
createHeuristic(String) - Method in class model.HeuristicsFactory
gets String heuristic name and creates an instance of the suitable heuristic
this method return the instance of the heuristic which was created.
